## OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilder.OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilderOptions.processLayersDefault property

If `true`<!-- -->, all unspecified layers will be processed. If `false`<!-- -->, all unspecified layers will be ignored.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
processLayersDefault?: boolean;
```
